alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Lexington and northwestern Orangeburg Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Edisto Gardens, or 13 miles west of Orangeburg, moving northeast at 20 mph with pea sized hail. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North, Neeses, Woodford and Livingston. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 127 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg
